00024 template <typename Value>
00025 class TAttribute: virtual public iser::TCopySerializedWrap<iser::IObject>
00026 {
00027 public:
00028        typedef Value ValueType;
00029 
00030        enum DefaultAttributeFlags
00031        {
00032               DAF_OBLIGATORY = IAttributeStaticInfo::AF_OBLIGATORY | IAttributeStaticInfo::AF_NULLABLE,
00033               DAF_OPTIONAL = IAttributeStaticInfo::AF_NULLABLE
00034        };
00035 
00036        TAttribute();

00038

00040

00106 // reimplemented (ISerializable)
00107 
00108 template <typename Value>
00109 bool TAttribute<Value>::Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive)
00110 {
00111        bool retVal = true;
00112 
00113        static iser::CArchiveTag valueTag("Value", "Value of attribute");
00114        retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(valueTag);
00115 
00116        retVal = retVal && archive.Process(m_value);
00117 
00118        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(valueTag);
00119 
00120        return retVal;
00121 }
